name: Revivify - Meadow Fix
description: Makes Dual's Original Revivify mod compatible with Rain Meadow and combines Daimyo's Proximity-based Revivify as an option for easy method switching. Art by me (Auxiar)<LINE> source code at: github.com/Auxiar/RevivifyMeadowFix <LINE><LINE> Original Revivify Description: <LINE>Revive slugcat and slugpup corpses, in co-op or not! Lay your friend flat on a solid floor and rhythmically tap GRAB twice per second to resuscitate them. Returning from death's door is an ordeal, so take care of them afterwards.<LINE><LINE>Configurable. Art by twitter.com/GarbageWastes and [original] code at github.com/Dual-Iron/revivify
